name: Flameout (ternarydesigns)
description:
A game about burning out. You play a lone firefighter trying to stop a blaze from overtaking a factory. The only issue is there are furnaces constantly catching ablaze, and without you they'll that the whole building down! How long can you survive the blazing inferno?

The hearts are your health, the blue bar is the facility health/integrity. Taking a hit costs health, while the lit furnaces degrade the facility over time. Facility integrity refills after every level, your health does not.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys - movement

Mouse - point to aim, click to shoot

M - mute music

N - must sound effects

Esc - pause

WARNING: I've had some flakiness with this game and Firefox. I don't have too much experience with WebGL, so I might be taxing it in weird ways. Restarts might be able to help if the game is struggling to load at first.
